51 Device::Device(uint8_t type, string name, string uuid, unsigned long lastSeq, ros::Time lastSeen,
52  unsigned long heartbeat, map<string, Feature> features)
53  : type(type), name(name), uuid(uuid), lastSeq(lastSeq), lastSeen(lastSeen), heartbeat(heartbeat), features(features)
54 {
55  active = true;
56 }

74 Feature* Device::GetFeatureByUUID(string uuid)
75 {
76  if (features.count(uuid) > 0)
77  return &features.at(uuid);
78  else
79  return 0;
80 }

97 string Device::GetName() const
98 {
99  if (name.empty())
100  return uuid;
101  else

105 vector<Feature*> Device::GetSortedFeatures()
106 {
107  // Iterate through all features and save a pointer to them in the vector
108  vector<Feature*> featureList;
109  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
110  featureList.push_back(&it->second);
111 
112  // Vector contains more than on entry -> sort it alphabetically
113  if (featureList.size() > 1)
114  sort(featureList.begin(), featureList.end(), compareFeatureNames);
115  return featureList;
116 }

119 {
120  return type;

124 {
125  return uuid;
126 }
127 
128 void Device::Update(uint8_t type, string name, unsigned long lastSeq, ros::Time lastSeen, unsigned long heartbeat,
129  map<string, Feature> featureUpdate)
130 {
131  // First update basic data
132  this->type = type;
133  this->name = name;
134  this->lastSeq = lastSeq;
135  this->lastSeen = lastSeen;
136  this->heartbeat = heartbeat;
137 
138  // New feature map is empty - clear our own feature map
139  if (featureUpdate.size() == 0)
140  {
141  features.clear();
142  return;
143  }
144 
145  // Old feature map is empty, just use the new one as current feature map
146  if (features.size() == 0)
147  {
148  features = featureUpdate;
149  return;
150  }
151 
152  // Both feature maps contain one or more features but the same number of feature -> compare them by iterating through
153  // all and check if there exists a feature with the same uuid and if yes if they are identical
154  bool equ = true;
155  if (features.size() == featureUpdate.size())
156  {
157  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
158  {
159  if (!featureUpdate.count(it->second.GetUUID()) == 1)
160  equ = false;
161  else if (!(featureUpdate.at(it->second.GetUUID()) == it->second))
162  equ = false;
163  }
164  }
165  else
166  equ = false;
167 
168  // The number of features wasn't the same or at least one feature didn't exist or was different -> update the feature
169  // map
170  if (!equ)
171  {
172  // Iterate through all new features
173  for (auto it = featureUpdate.begin(); it != featureUpdate.end(); ++it)
174  {
175  // If the feature doesn't exist -> add it to the feature map
176  if (features.count(it->second.GetUUID()) == 0)
177  features.emplace(it->second.GetUUID(), it->second);
178  // Feature already exists -> just update its data
179  else
180  features.at(it->second.GetUUID()).Update(it->second.GetType(), it->second.GetName());
181  }
182 
183  // Now iterate through all existing features and check, if there is one or more missing in the new feature map. If
184  // yes -> delete it from our feature map.
185  // TODO: Check if the pointers are safe -> Maybe it's necessary to first store what has to be deleted and then
186  // iterate through the delete-vector to actually delete the features
187  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
188  {
189  if (featureUpdate.count(it->second.GetUUID()) == 0)
190  features.erase(it->second.GetUUID());
191  }
192  }
193  active = true;
194 }

196 // Private member functions
197 
198 bool Device::compareFeatureNames(const Feature* first, const Feature* second)
199 {
200  string temp1, temp2;
201  temp1 = first->GetName();
202  temp2 = second->GetName();
203  transform(temp1.begin(), temp1.end(), temp1.begin(), ::towlower);
204  transform(temp2.begin(), temp2.end(), temp2.begin(), ::towlower);
205  bool result = temp1 < temp2;
206  return result;
207 }
208 }
Tapi::Device::compareFeatureNames
static bool compareFeatureNames(const Feature *first, const Feature *second)
To sort Feature there has to be a compare function, comparing their names.
